item.title: TCP vs UDP: Understanding the Differences üåê
item.description: In this blog post, we will compare the key differences between TCP and UDP, two essential protocols used to send data over a network. We will discuss their features, use cases, and help you decide which protocol is best for your specific needs. üöÄ
